Articles.Content:
I'm baaaaaaaack.

...Back from my multi-year Kerbal hiatus to point out your UI bugs; your lazy attachment meshes; your lack of camera restraints, your colorblind aesthetic choices; your upside-down idea of a career-mode difficulty arch; your inanely constructed R&D parts tiers that maliciously mislead new players into trying things you KNOW won't work; your thoughtless lack of timing and reasonable clear conditions to the contracts presented in mission control; your heavy-handed misapplication of aerodynamic forces requiring 90% of rockets to have fins, regardless of their engine's gimbaling power...

Roundly speaking: I'm back to lambaste the once and ever present LACK of game design in you, Kerbal Space Program. (you German-simulator wannabe)
#BringBackTheBarn


All while playing through a stock career, in permadeath Hard mode, to at least a surface landing of Duna... of course.


With love,
-Roninpawn

[snip]
Thread locked at OP request.
